LightningComponentBundle.description: An image and inline text that work in tandem to communicate a state in a more friendly way. Use within other components, such as cards, to express the state of the component.

property.label: Heading
property.name: heading
property.description: Text displayed below the image to describe why it is being displayed. Should always be specified unless `Text Only` is checked.

property.label: Message
property.name: messageBody
property.description: Text displayed below the Heading to provide further description about the why the illustration is being displayed.

property.label: Text Only
property.name: textOnly
property.description: Whether or not to hide the image from the layout.
